trigger: Recruitment and extravasation of T cells through the blood-brain barrier are favored by adhesion molecule - mediated interactions of circulating T cells with endothelial cells .
Recruitment and extravasation of T cells through the blood-brain barrier are favored by adhesion molecule - mediated interactions of circulating T cells with endothelial cells .

Since a common pathological finding in human T-cell leukemia virus type 1 ( HTLV-1 ) - associated diseases is the infiltration of HTLV-1-infected T lymphocytes into various organs , we have looked for the profile of adhesion molecules expressed by HTLV-1-transformed T cells .

Since a common pathological finding in human T-cell leukemia virus type 1 ( HTLV-1 ) - associated diseases is the infiltration of HTLV-1-infected T lymphocytes into various organs , we have looked for the profile of adhesion molecules expressed by HTLV-1-transformed T cells .
